channel.title: *how to add PK points/Pk Points shop exchange*
channel.description:
ok, so i was wondering how i could add pk point onto my server..and make it so it can keep track of that persons pk points, so whane ever they logg in it says 'so and so has this many pk points'..also, whenever someone kills someone [1v1] a message comes up for them that says'
'you now have this many pk points'..
and how can i make it so the amount of pk points they have, go towards a shop, that you can only but st00f with a certian amount of pk points..
*EDIT: i DID use search bar [and www.google.com] so don't post any stuff that says try search bar or google.com..because i already used it.
NOTE: it doesn't have to be EXACTLY like i described..just sort of similiar..thanks everyone! please help me btw :(
BTW i don't really know if this matters, but i'm using EmpireScape source 317 [NOT ADVERTISING]. please post. TY!

item.title: *how to add PK points/Pk Points shop exchange*

item.description:
@p00n_scape wrote:

GO LOOK FOR A TUT. > . < .
